pullrequest.title: Ctrl+S now opens SaveAs dialog for freshly saving file

content.raw:
This works for me! I just have one comment about a cppcheck error.

Also, it would be interesting to write a test for this if you're interested, but it's not required. The test would go into `MainWindow_TEST`, trigger save / save as, fill the browse dialog as needed, verify that the file was created, then delete the file. There is a similar example [here](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/35a658f8d8d5c789196730975db04b45633276f0/src/MainWindow_TEST.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#MainWindow_TEST.cc-98); it's not exactly the same because save and save as have slightly different meanings there, but the way the action is triggered and the file is saved should be the same.
content.html:
This works for me! I just have one comment about a cppcheck error.

Also, it would be interesting to write a test for this if you're interested, but it's not required. The test would go into MainWindow_TEST, trigger save / save as, fill the browse dialog as needed, verify that the file was created, then delete the file. There is a similar example here; it's not exactly the same because save and save as have slightly different meanings there, but the way the action is triggered and the file is saved should be the same.
